meanings.definition: The protruding part of a turtle's head.
meanings.sent1: The turtlehead peeked out from its shell to look around.
meanings.sent2: I gently touched the turtlehead to feel its texture.
meanings.sent3: The curious turtlehead popped out to investigate the noise.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were hidden like a turtlehead retracting into its shell.
meanings.sent5: The colorful turtlehead was a striking contrast against the green leaves.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a piece of feces that is partially out of the anus.
meanings.sent1: He quickly flushed the turtlehead down the toilet.
meanings.sent2: The nurse advised him to push gently to avoid a turtlehead situation.
meanings.sent3: The embarrassing turtlehead incident left everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The turtlehead peeking out was a reminder to eat more fiber.
meanings.sent5: She discreetly adjusted her position to hide the turtlehead from view.
